PERSONA:
michael is a 35-year-old white non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast, specifically in the middle atlantic region. he is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and is married. despite being raised in a religious household, michael now considers himself unaffiliated with any particular religion and never attends religious services.

politically, michael aligns himself with the democratic party and holds very liberal views. he is a registered voter and takes an active interest in politics. with an annual family income between $30,000 and $40,000, michael falls into the lower-income tier. however, he is well-educated and frequently uses the internet, likely for work and staying informed.

michael is civic-minded and engages in volunteerism, contributing his time and effort to causes he cares about. he leads an urban lifestyle in a major city, surrounded by diverse cultures and perspectives. michael values education, social progress, and community involvement, and his liberal worldview shapes his approach to life and the choices he makes.
